mapper.select: SELECT welcomeMessage from a_welcome where groupId = #{groupId}
SELECT pictureNum from a_welcome where groupId = #{groupId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO a_welcome (groupId,welcomeMessage) VALUES (#{groupId},#{welcomeMessage}) ON CONFLICT(groupId) DO UPDATE SET welcomeMessage=#{welcomeMessage}
INSERT INTO a_welcome (groupId,pictureNum) VALUES (#{groupId},#{pictureNum}) ON CONFLICT(groupId) DO UPDATE SET pictureNum=#{pictureNum}
